long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab into an efficient working area, take notes, organize bookmarks, stay motivated with uplifting quotes.
The extension will update your new tab settings and will change your search to be powered by Microsoft Bing.

By clicking the “Add to Chrome”, I accept and agree to installing  Global Glamours extension and setting Chrome™ New Tab to that provided by the service, setting New Tab searches to be powered by Microsoft Bing, the Terms of Use and the Privacy Policy.

Features:
- Quotes
- Notes
- Daily News
- Popular sites - some of the links might be affiliated.
- Manage bookmarks
- Quick links to Chrome Downloads, History and Bookmarks

Terms of Use:
https://globalglamours.com/term-of-use
Privacy Policy:
https://globalglamours.com/privacy-policy
